name: Shilajit (Purified)
description: Mineral-rich biomass exudate from Himalayan rocks, used in Ayurvedic medicine for millennia. Contains fulvic acid, dibenzo-alpha-pyrones, and 85+ minerals. Enhances mitochondrial CoQ10 function, increases testosterone, and supports mineral absorption. Must be purified and tested for heavy metals.

dosage.notes: MUST be purified and tested for heavy metals. PrimaVie is most studied branded extract. Take in morning. Traditional use: dissolved in warm milk or water.

keyFindings: Increased testosterone by 20% in healthy men (Clinical Ther & Pharm, 2016)
Enhanced CoQ10 function in mitochondria (synergistic effect)
Improved sperm count and motility in infertile men
